title: Matchsafe, "Asian Female with Parasol", ca. 1895
markings: SILVEROIN stamped on front and reverse bezel.
provenance: Collection of Carol B. Brener and Stephen W. Brener
creditline: Gift of Stephen W. Brener and Carol B. Brener
description: Oblong with curved sides, top and bottom, featuring raised decoration of woman in long, asian-style kimono, she holds parasol in left hand and reaches for planted, long-stemmed flower with right, background of suspended lanterns, plum blossoms and birds in flight. Lid hinged on side. Striker on bottom.

tombstone.epitaph:
Matchsafe, "Asian Female with Parasol", ca. 1895.
ca. 1895. Metal alloy. Gift of Stephen W. Brener and Carol B. Brener. 1980-14-69.
